Collate summary measures from naniar into one tibble

miss_summary performs all of the missing data helper summaries and puts them into lists within a tibble

miss_summary(data)

Arguments

data

a dataframe

Value

a tibble of missing data summaries

Examples


s_miss <- miss_summary(airquality)
s_miss$miss_df_prop
#> [1] 0.04793028
s_miss$miss_case_table
#> [[1]]
#> # A tibble: 3 x 3
#>   n_missing_in_case n_cases  percent
#>               <int>   <int>    <dbl>
#> 1                 0     111 72.54902
#> 2                 1      40 26.14379
#> 3                 2       2  1.30719
#> 
# etc, etc, etc.

library(dplyr)
s_miss_group <- group_by(airquality, Month) %>% miss_summary()
s_miss_group$miss_df_prop
#> [1] 0.04793028
s_miss_group$miss_case_table
#> [[1]]
#> # A tibble: 11 x 4
#>    Month n_missing_in_case n_cases   percent
#>    <int>             <int>   <int>     <dbl>
#>  1     5                 0      24 77.419355
#>  2     5                 1       5 16.129032
#>  3     5                 2       2  6.451613
#>  4     6                 0       9 30.000000
#>  5     6                 1      21 70.000000
#>  6     7                 0      26 83.870968
#>  7     7                 1       5 16.129032
#>  8     8                 0      23 74.193548
#>  9     8                 1       8 25.806452
#> 10     9                 0      29 96.666667
#> 11     9                 1       1  3.333333
#> 
# etc, etc, etc.
